Author: Lollipop
Name: ChatPlusTranslatorXIV
Punchline: Auto-translates chat messages in real time with full customization.
Description: Replaces or augments the FFXIV chat box with real-time auto-translation for outgoing and incoming messages. Supports customizable language targets and message direction, designed for raiders and roleplayers alike.
Changelog:
- Initial release of ChatPlusTranslatorXIV
- Replace or augment FFXIV's chat box
- Translate incoming/outgoing/both messages
- Multiple display options (replace, below, tooltip)
- Language selection and API-ready structure
